name: teachtrack-cbc
description: Curriculum tracking system for Kenyan CBC teachers

scripts.prod:all: concurrently "npm run prod:backend" "npm run prod:celery" "npm run prod:frontend" --names "API,CELERY,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "blue,yellow,green"
scripts.prod:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:prod: cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt && pip install -r requirements_production.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install
